availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Gillis (Caldwell co., Ky, job worker.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, job worker. Tennessee native. Son of Thomas Gillis and Feraby Gillis. Married to Elvira Gillis. Father of Serena Gillis, Elizabeth Gillis, Sarah E. Gillis, and Thomas Gillis. Resident in Roane County, Tennessee, in 1850. Job worker in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Roane County, Subdivision 20, p. 376A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 117-18.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, Dunklin County, Freeborn, p. 590D.
